v3.1.08 - Fix movement animation lag

## Major Changes \(v3.0.75 ~ v3.1.08\)

### v3.1.08 - Movement Animation Lag Fix
- Fix: Use Commands.Empty check to prevent repeated EndTurn during movement animation
- Apply LESSONS_LEARNED 12.2: "ì™„ì „ ì œì–´ ë˜ëŠ” ì™„ì „ ìœ„ì„, ì¤‘ê°„ì€ ìœ„í—˜"
- Remove pendingEndTurn approach in favor of command queue check

### v3.1.05~07 - MP Recovery + Movement
- v3.1.05: Add HasMoveActions flag to prevent replan loop when Move is already planned
- v3.1.06: Allow Move execution when AP=0 but MP>0 \(Move uses MP not AP\)
- v3.1.07: \(superseded by v3.1.08\)

### v3.1.00~04 - MP Recovery Prediction
- v3.1.00: bypassCanMoveCheck for MP recovery abilities
- v3.1.01: Pass predictedMP to MovementAPI for reachable tile calculation
- v3.1.02~04: Various fixes for Move execution after MP recovery

### Other Changes
- Add RoleDetector.cs for automatic role detection
- Add TurnEventHandler.cs for game event subscription
- Various bug fixes and improvements

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
v3.1.12 - Game API-based ability auto-detection

## Changes \(v3.1.09 ~ v3.1.12\)

### v3.1.12 - AutoDetectTiming Enhancement
- Use game API for ability classification \(IsHeroicAct, IsDesperateMeasure, IsCharge, etc.\)
- Analyze AbilityEffectRunAction components for accurate timing detection
- Use EffectOnAlly/EffectOnEnemy for buff/debuff classification
- Add DesperateMeasure enum for momentum abilities
- New helper: HasActionOfType<T>\(\) for component analysis

### v3.1.11 - Bonus Ability Usage Fix
- Fix Run and Gun bonus usage detection
- Allow abilities on cooldown if IsBonusUsage is available
- Check IsAvailable with cooldown-only UnavailabilityReasons

### v3.1.10 - PreAttackBuff Guard
- Prevent PreAttackBuff \(ì†ì‚¬\) usage when no attacks available
- Add AvailableAttacks check in ScoreBuff\(\), PlanAttackBuffWithReservation\(\)
- Filter PreAttackBuff/HeroicAct/RighteousFury from Phase 6.5/7.5 fallback

### v3.1.09 - Replan Logic Consolidation
- Move AP/MP increase detection from TurnOrchestrator to TurnPlan.NeedsReplan\(\)
- Add InitialAP/InitialMP to TurnPlan for change detection
- Organize replan conditions: execution failure â†’ emergency â†’ new opportunity

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
v3.5.15 - Fix TurnEnding ability cooldown group error

## Changes
- Fix: TurnEnding abilities \(StalwartDefense\) no longer cause cooldown group loop
- Add IsAbilityOnCooldownWithGroups\(\) to check shared cooldown groups
- Use PartAbilityCooldowns.IsOnCooldown\(\) for accurate group cooldown detection
- Filter out abilities with group cooldown conflicts before planning

## Technical Details
- GetUnavailabilityReasons\(\) doesn''t detect shared cooldown groups
- WeaponAttackAbilityGroup_AdditionalLimbs was triggering false positives
- Now properly checks PartAbilityCooldowns before planning TurnEnding abilities

v3.5.19 - Team Coordination & Tactical Movement

## Changes \(v3.5.16 ~ v3.5.19\)

### v3.5.19 - Logging Verification
- Change LogDebug to Log for v3.5.18 feature verification
- Confirm SharedTarget and Tactical scoring visible in logs

### v3.5.18 - Response Curves & Blackboard Integration
- Add TeamBlackboard integration to MovementAPI position scoring
- SharedTargetBonus: Prioritize positions near team''s focus target
- TacticalAdjustment: Adjust aggression based on TeamConfidence
- Apply CurrentTactic \(Attack/Defend/Retreat\) modifiers to positioning
- Add Response Curves: ThreatCountPenalty, SafetyByDistance, CoverValue

### v3.5.17 - Tank Aggressive Movement
- Add shouldEngageMelee and advanceFrontline flags for Tank role
- Tank now moves toward enemies when CanMelee and allies need protection
- Use GetTacticalMoveTarget\(\) for SharedTarget priority

### v3.5.16 - Duplicate Ability Group Fix
- Add GetAbilityCooldownGroups\(\) for accurate cooldown group detection
- Fix duplicate ability execution by checking group membership
- Improve TurnEnding ability selection reliability

v3.5.21 - Performance Settings UI + Auto-generate Config Files

## Changes

### Performance Settings UI \(v3.5.20\)
- Add 4 configurable performance settings to UI:
  - Max Enemies to Analyze \(threat prediction\)
  - Max Positions to Evaluate \(AOE targeting\)
  - Max Enemy Clusters \(AOE opportunities\)
  - Max Tiles per Enemy \(threat zone precision\)
- Wire hardcoded constants to ModSettings in ClusterDetector.cs, EnemyMobilityAnalyzer.cs
- Add localization strings \(English/Korean\)

### UI Size Fix \(v3.5.21\)
- Increase font sizes \(size=18~20 for labels\)
- Wider UI elements \(slider width=500, box minWidth=700\)
- Larger toggle button \(height=40, width=400\)
- New DrawSliderSettingIntLarge\(\) for bigger controls

### Auto-generate Config Files \(v3.5.21\)
- settings.json: Auto-create with defaults if not exists
- aiconfig.json: Auto-create with defaults if not exists
- Add AIConfig.SaveDefault\(\) method

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
v3.5.34 - GapCloser MP Cost Prediction

## Changes \(v3.5.33 ~ v3.5.34\)

### v3.5.34 - GapCloser MP Cost Prediction
- Add GetGapCloserMPCost\(\) using game''s FindPathChargeTB_Blocking\(\) API
- Add GetAbilityExpectedMPCost\(\) unified API for ability MP costs
- Modify PlanGapCloser\(\) to check MP cost before planning
- MP cost = path.path.Count - 1 \(actual tile count, same as game\)
- Prevents planning moves after GapCloser when MP would be depleted

### v3.5.33 - Charge Freeze Fix
- Fix game freeze after Charge abilities \(stale FoundBetterPlace data\)
- Clear FoundBetterPlace after CastAbility execution
- Add CombatAPI.CanMove\(\) check before movement
- Clear stale data at SetupMovement start

### Technical Details
- Game API: PathfindingService.FindPathChargeTB_Blocking\(\)
- MP calculation matches AbilityCustomDirectMovement.RegisterMoveCells\(\)
- Charge path calculation differs from normal movement path

ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
